block_00: Maximize your returns in the commodity market
block_02: From grains to gold: your guide to commodities
block_03: Many traders underestimate commodity trading, thinking that it’s less profitable than trading stocks or forex. And they are wrong! From gold and oil to agricultural products, these raw materials are not just essential for the world economy — they can also present profitable trading opportunities.
block_04: Commodity prices tend to react to global events, supply and demand shifts, and economic trends, allowing smart traders to capitalize on these movements.
block_05: In this article, you’ll learn the main factors driving commodity prices and discover the best tools to trade these markets on IQ Option. If you’re ready to unlock the potential of commodities, head over to the blog and discover how they can fuel your portfolio!
block_09: Can I trade on IQ Option during the weekend?
block_12: While most global markets are closed for trading during the weekend, there are some exceptions. These include certain forex pairs, cryptocurrencies, stocks and more. You can find the full list of available assets and get some practical tips for trading on the weekend in this article.
